CustomField.formula:
IF(TEXT(p2s_base1__Statistic__c)="Lifecycle Balance", Text(p2s_base1__Type__c) & " Balance of " & TEXT(p2s_base1__ToLifecycleStage__c) & " on " & TEXT(p2s_base1__CalendarToDate__c),
IF(TEXT(p2s_base1__Statistic__c)="Lifecycle Conversion Rate",Text(p2s_base1__Type__c) & " Conversion Rate from " & TEXT(p2s_base1__FromLifecycleStage__c) & " to " & TEXT(p2s_base1__ToLifecycleStage__c),
Text(p2s_base1__Type__c)& " " & Text(p2s_base1__FromLifecycleStage__c) & " to " & Text(p2s_base1__ToLifecycleStage__c) & " " & Text(p2s_base1__CalendarFromDate__c) & "-" & Text(p2s_base1__CalendarToDate__c)))
CustomField.label: Record Label
